description:
Authentic Online Self-Promotion Strategies to Catch the Attention of your Clients, Win their Trust and Stand out from the Noise

Are you a freelancer, coach or consultant who's looking to pick up some more clients online?

Are your "promotions" getting lost in the shuffle?

Is your message being drowned out by the noise?

Discover the Step-by-Step Strategy for getting Noticed without being Spammy, Sleazy, Pushy or Annoying

Get the answer to questions like..

"What's the proper way for promoting myself when I'm looking for clients?"

"How do I promote myself and my business without being a "salesy" or "pushy"?"

"Where exactly should I go to promote myself so I get noticed?"

"How do I get my promotions to be noticed instead of being drowned out by all the spam?"

"How do I start building credibility online?"

Learn how you can use The "5 Factors of Self-Promotion" Framework to Authentically Promote yourself to your Customers and Clients, Stand out from your Competitors and win new Business

Factor 1 - Platform Trend

Factor 2 - Common Desired Benefits

Factor 3 - Hidden Objections

Factor 4 - Pitchfork Tripwire

Factor 5 - Alignment Magnet

See you inside the course!
title: Customer Acquisition with Social Media Content Marketing
